Class Evaluator

java.lang.Object
Evaluator
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExpressionEvaluator
class Evaluator extends Object implements IExpressionEvaluator
A class for evaluating mathematical expressions.

      public int evaluate(String expression)
      Evaluates a postfix expression.
      Specified by:
      evaluate in interface IExpressionEvaluator
      Parameters:
      expression - the postfix expression to evaluate
      Returns:
      the result of the evaluation
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the expression is invalid or contains division by zero
